languages.text: {n}Идира кладет руки на виски пленника, смотрит ему в глаза и открывает рот. Тени в помещении начинают метаться, а из уст псайкерши вырывается нечеловеческая какофония звуков. Мужчина начинает трястись и хрипеть. Его лицо скорчено в гримасе боли и ужаса, а из носа текут струи крови. Спустя пару минут, Идира, пошатываясь, возвращается к вам.{/n}

{n}Idira lays her hands on the prisoner's temples, looks into his eyes, and opens her mouth. The shadows in the room dart back and forth, and an unnatural, discordant wave of noise bursts from the psyker's lips. The man's body shudders, his breathing turns ragged. His face contorts into a grimace of pain and horror, blood trickles from his nose. A few minutes later, Idira staggers back to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Идира кладет руки на виски пленника, смотрит ему в глаза и открывает рот. languages.text: {n}Idira lleva las manos a las sienes del prisionero, le mira a los ojos y abre la boca. Las sombras de la sala se mueven con rapidez al tiempo que una oleada de sonidos antinaturales y discordantes surge de los labios de la psíquica. El cuerpo del hombre se estremece y su respiración se agita. Su rostro se retuerce en una mueca de dolor y terror, y un reguero de sangre brota de su nariz. Tras unos minutos, Idira vuelve tambaleante hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lays her hands on the prisoner's temples, looks into his eyes, and opens her mouth. languages.text: {n}イディラは囚人のこめかみに手を置き男の目を見つめ、口を開いた。部屋の影が前後に揺れ動き、異能者の唇から不自然で不協和音のノイズの波がワッと溢れ出す。男の体が震え、呼吸が荒くなる。その顔は苦痛と恐怖に歪み、鼻から血がたらりと流れた。数分後、イディラがよろめきながら戻ってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lays her hands on the prisoner's temples, looks into his eyes, and opens her mouth. The shadows in the room dart back and forth, and an unnatural, discordant wave of noise bursts from the psyker's lips. The man's body shudders, his breathing turns ragged. His face contorts into a grimace of pain and horror, blood trickles from his nose. A few minutes later, Idira staggers back to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは囚人のこめかみに手を当てると男の目を見つめ、口を開いた。部屋の影が前後に揺れ動き、異能者の唇から不自然で不協和音のノイズの波がワッと溢れ出す。男の体が震え、呼吸が荒くなる。その顔は苦痛と恐怖に歪み、鼻から血がたらりと流れた。数分後、イディラがよろめきながら戻ってくる。{/n}
{n}イディラは囚人のこめかみに手を当てると男の目を見つめ、口を開いた。部屋の影が前後に揺れ動き、異能者の唇から不自然で不協和音のノイズの波がワッと溢れ出す。男の体が震え、呼吸が荒くなる。その顔は苦痛と恐怖に歪み、鼻から血がたらりと流れた。数分後、イディラがよろめきながら戻ってくる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉将手搭在犯人的太阳穴上，盯着他的眼睛，张开了嘴。房间里的阴影四处乱窜，某种不和谐的诡异声音从伊迪拉嘴里迸发出来。犯人的身体不住颤抖，整张脸扭曲起来，充满了痛苦与恐惧，鲜血从他的鼻子里喷涌而出。几分钟之后，伊迪拉摇摇晃晃地回到了你身边。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lays her hands on the prisoner's temples, looks into his eyes, and opens her mouth. The shadows in the room dart back and forth, and an unnatural, discordant wave of noise bursts from the psyker's lips. The man's body shudders, his breathing turns ragged. His face contorts into a grimace of pain and horror, blood trickles from his nose. A few minutes later, Idira staggers back to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira legt ihre Hände an die Schläfen des Gefangenen, blickt in seine Augen und öffnet ihren Mund. Die Schatten im Raum huschen hin und her, und eine unnatürliche, diskordante Welle von Geräuschen sprudelt aus den Lippen der Psionikerin hervor. Der Körper des Mannes schaudert, sein Atem wird unregelmäßig, abgehackt. Sein Gesicht verzerrt sich zu einer Maske von Schmerz und Grauen, Blut tropft ihm aus der Nase. Einige Minuten später kommt Idira wieder zu dir getaumelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lays her hands on the prisoner's temples, looks into his eyes, and opens her mouth. languages.text: {n}Idira place ses mains sur les tempes du prisonnier, puis elle plonge son regard dans le sien et ouvre la bouche. Les ombres de la pièce se mettent à s'agiter fébrilement et une déferlante contre nature de bruits discordants surgit des lèvres de la psyker. Le corps de l'homme se met à trembler et sa respiration se fait saccadée. Son visage se contorsionne en une grimace de souffrance et d'horreur alors qu'un filet de sang s'écoule de son nez. Quelques minutes plus tard, Idira revient vers vous d'un pas chancelant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İdira, ellerini mahkûmun şakaklarına koyarak gözlerine bakıyor ve ağzını açıyor. Odadaki gölgeler, bir ileri bir geri gidip geliyor. Ruhsezerin dudaklarından doğaüstü ve ahenksiz bir ses dalgası yayılıyor. Adamın bedeni zangırdamaya, nefesi düzensizleşmeye başlıyor. Yüzü, acı ve korkuyla eğrilip bükülüyor. Burnundan kan fışkırıyor. İdira, birkaç dakika sonra sendeleyerek sana yaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira lays her hands on the prisoner's temples, looks into his eyes, and opens her mouth. The shadows in the room dart back and forth, and an unnatural, discordant wave of noise bursts from the psyker's lips. The man's body shudders, his breathing turns ragged. His face contorts into a grimace of pain and horror, blood trickles from his nose. A few minutes later, Idira staggers back to you.{/n}
